data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Shravasti, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shravasti, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Shravasti who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Shravasti, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Shravasti, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Shravasti, Uttar Pradesh, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jat Dhankar people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jat Dhankar people know you.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Shravasti, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 12,291 believers living in Shravasti, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Shravasti, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 1,117,400.

We estimate Shravasti has 12,291 people who might know Jesus, 13,558 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,091,551 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Shravasti to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

location.name: Shravasti
